ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 4 Channel DVR with 1 x Outdoor and 1 x Indoor SONY CCD Camera. iPhone, Android, and VGA support, Real Time Video/Audio Recording, Playback and Network capability, Network Video Monitor System browsing, PTZ Control.
DVR Feature: Support Phones with iPhone, Android, Windows Mobile, and Symbian VGA support IE or NVMS software (Network Video Monitor System) browsing PELCO-P ,PELCO-D, Samsung, Panasonic Manual/schedule/Motion Detection Recording Modes Time & date search easy access Live monitoring through internet from anywhere Easy navigation
GW706A: Waterproof Outdoor Day & Night IR Color Camera. 1/3" SONY CCD, Vari-Focal 4~9mm Lens, 540 TV Lines, 42PCs IR LED.
Excellent High-Res. technology 540 TV lines of Horizontal resolution Lens focus and zoom are adjusted from outside of camera Gama Characteristic:0.45 Night-time Vision: 0 Lux with IR LED on. Adopt Taiwan high quality IR LED, having very good night-vision effect
GW731L: Professional indoor dome camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 560 TV lines, Metal Vandal Proof. Low Illumination 0.001 Lux (with IR LED on).
